name: Extreme Seasons
description:
You find yourself on a strange planet with intense seasons! Summers are brutally hot, and winters are freezing cold. With your limited resources, try to survive through as many seasons as you can as the planet revolves around the sun! Gather resources on the planet, go fishing, and build fires to survive the environment.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move around
  • Mouse - Look around
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Pick up item
  • I - Open inventory
  • Click (With inventory open) - Place item in hotbar
  • 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 - Select hotbar slot
  • Right click (With item in hand) - Use item
  • Q (With item in hand) - Drop item

Credits:

  • Marty Hanapole - 3D art, 2D art, VFX and graphics, UI
  • Joel Llaury - Programming, UI
  • Maria Jernigan - Level design, terrain building, music
  • Matthew Jaffe - Programming
  • Samuel Abraham - Game Design Support

Created during the Gaming Project @ VT Spring 2022 Game Jam
